AllocateCostUnitResource.title: AllocateCostUnitResource
AllocateCostUnitResource.summary: Transfers resource instances from the source cost center to the destination cost center.

ApplyInvoice.summary: Submits an application for an invoice.

ConfirmRelation.summary: Confirms the invitation initiated by the master account.

ConvertChargeType.summary: Changes the billing method of an instance. You can call this operation to switch the billing method from pay-as-you-go to subscription for Server Load Balancer (SLB) instances, elastic IP addresses (EIPs), and NAT gateways, and switch the billing method from subscription to pay-as-you-go for SLB instances and EIPs.

CreateAgAccount.summary: Creates an account to establish a financial relationship.

CreateCostUnit.summary: Creates a cost center. You can create multiple cost centers at a time.

CreateInstance.title: CreateInstance
CreateInstance.summary: Creates an instance. If you call this operation, an order for a new instance is created and the order is automatically paid for. You cannot create Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances or ApsaraDB RDS instances by calling the operation.

CreateResellerUserQuota.summary: Creates a quota ledger and a consumption ledger.

DescribeCostBudgetsSummary.title: DescribeCostBudgetsSummary
DescribeCostBudgetsSummary.summary: Query the summary information of the user "Cost Management-Budget".

DescribeInstanceAmortizedCostByAmortizat.summary: Queries the monthly allocated costs of instances by allocation month.

DescribeInstanceBill.title: DescribeInstanceBill
DescribeInstanceBill.summary: Queries the billing information about instances or billable items in a billing cycle.

DescribePricingModule.summary: Queries the pricing information about an Alibaba Cloud service.

DescribeProductAmortizedCostByAmortizati.summary: Queries the allocated costs of services by allocation month.

DescribeResourceCoverageDetail.title: DescribeResourceCoverageDetail
DescribeResourceCoverageDetail.summary: Queries the coverage details of reserved instances (RIs) or storage capacity units (SCUs).

DescribeResourceCoverageTotal.title: DescribeResourceCoverageTotal
DescribeResourceCoverageTotal.summary: Queries the total coverage data of reserved instances (RIs) or storage capacity units (SCUs).

DescribeResourcePackageProduct.title: DescribeResourcePackageProduct
DescribeResourcePackageProduct.summary: Queries the information about resource plans of an Alibaba Cloud service.

DescribeResourceUsageDetail.title: DescribeResourceUsageDetail
DescribeResourceUsageDetail.summary: Queries the usage details of reserved instances (RIs) or storage capacity units (SCUs).

DescribeResourceUsageTotal.title: DescribeResourceUsageTotal
DescribeResourceUsageTotal.summary: Queries the total usage data of reserved instances or storage capacity units (SCUs).

DescribeSavingsPlansCoverageDetail.title: DescribeSavingsPlansCoverageDetail
DescribeSavingsPlansCoverageDetail.summary: Queries the coverage details of savings plans.

DescribeSavingsPlansCoverageTotal.title: DescribeSavingsPlansCoverageTotal
DescribeSavingsPlansCoverageTotal.summary: Queries the coverage summary of savings plans.

DescribeSavingsPlansUsageDetail.title: DescribeSavingsPlansUsageDetail
DescribeSavingsPlansUsageDetail.summary: Queries the usage details of savings plans.

DescribeSavingsPlansUsageTotal.title: DescribeSavingsPlansUsageTotal
DescribeSavingsPlansUsageTotal.summary: Queries the usage summary of savings plans.

GetAccountRelation.title: GetAccountRelation
GetAccountRelation.summary: Queries the details of a financial relationship.

GetCustomerAccountInfo.summary: Queries the account information about a customer of a virtual network operator (VNO).

GetCustomerList.title: GetCustomerList
GetCustomerList.summary: Queries the IDs of customers of a virtual network operator (VNO).

GetOrderDetail.title: GetOrderDetail
GetOrderDetail.summary: Queries the details of an order that belongs to your Alibaba Cloud account or distributors.

GetPayAsYouGoPrice.summary: Queries the pay-as-you-go price of an Alibaba Cloud service.

GetResourcePackagePrice.title: GetResourcePackagePrice
GetResourcePackagePrice.summary: Queries the price of a resource plan.

GetSubscriptionPrice.summary: Queries the subscription price of an Alibaba Cloud service.

InquiryPriceRefundInstance.title: InquiryPriceRefundInstance
InquiryPriceRefundInstance.summary: Queries the refundable amount for an instance from which you want to unsubscribe.

ModifyAccountRelation.summary: Adds or removes permissions granted to a member in a financial relationship.

ModifyCostUnit.summary: Modifies one or more cost centers.

ModifyInstance.summary: Modifies the configurations of an instance. When you call this operation, the system generates a modification order and automatically completes the payment. You cannot call this operation to modify the configurations of an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance or ApsaraDB RDS instance. To modify the configurations of an ECS or ApsaraDB RDS instance, call the dedicated operation of the corresponding service.

QueryAccountBalance.title: QueryAccountBalance
QueryAccountBalance.summary: Queries the balance of your account.

QueryAccountBill.title: QueryAccountBill
QueryAccountBill.summary: Queries the bills of your Alibaba Cloud account within a billing cycle. You can summarize the bills by resource owner.

QueryAccountTransactionDetails.summary: Queries the details of transactions within your account.

QueryAccountTransactions.title: QueryAccountTransactions
QueryAccountTransactions.summary: Queries transactions within your Alibaba Cloud account.

QueryBill.title: QueryBill
QueryBill.summary: Queries the bills in a billing cycle.

QueryBillOverview.title: QueryBillOverview
QueryBillOverview.summary: Queries the bill overview information in a billing cycle.

QueryBillToOSSSubscription.title: QueryBillToOSSSubscription
QueryBillToOSSSubscription.summary: Queries the subscribed bills that are stored in Object Storage Service (OSS) bucket.

QueryCommodityList.title: QueryCommodityList
QueryCommodityList.summary: Queries the information about a service based on the service code.

QueryCostUnit.title: QueryCostUnit
QueryCostUnit.summary: Queries all cost centers within the current node of the cost center tree. If the ParentUnitId parameter is set to -1, all cost centers are queried.

QueryCostUnitResource.title: QueryCostUnitResource
QueryCostUnitResource.summary: Queries the resource instances that are allocated to a cost center. If the unitId parameter is set to 0, the unallocated primary resource instances and sub-resource instances are queried.

QueryCustomerAddressList.summary: Queries the addresses to which invoices are mailed.

QueryDPUtilizationDetail.title: QueryDPUtilizationDetail
QueryDPUtilizationDetail.summary: Queries the usage of resource plans, including reserved instances (RIs) and storage capacity units (SCUs).

QueryEvaluateList.summary: Queries the information about the orders for which you want to apply for invoices.

QueryFinancialAccountInfo.summary: Queries the information about a financial account.

QueryInstanceBill.summary: Queries the bills of instances or billable items in a billing cycle.

QueryInstanceGaapCost.summary: Queries the monthly allocated costs of instances. The AccessKey pair of the management account is required for queries. You can query the full generally accepted accounting principles (GAAP) bills of the previous month after 12:00 on the fourth day of each month. If you query the GAAP bills before 12:00 on the fourth day of each month, the bills returned may be incomplete.

QueryInvoicingCustomerList.summary: Queries the information about invoice titles.

QueryOrders.summary: Queries the orders of your Alibaba Cloud account or distributors. By default, orders within the last hour are queried. To query earlier orders, specify the CreateTimeStart and CreateTimeEnd parameters.

QueryPermissionList.summary: Queries, by relationship ID, permissions granted to accounts between which a management-member relationship is established.

QueryPriceEntityList.title: QueryPriceEntityList
QueryPriceEntityList.summary: Queries the billable items of a service.

QueryProductList.summary: Queries the information about all Alibaba Cloud services.

QueryRIUtilizationDetail.title: QueryRIUtilizationDetail
QueryRIUtilizationDetail.summary: Queries the usage details of a reserved instance (RI).

QueryRedeem.title: QueryRedeem
QueryRedeem.summary: Queries the information about a voucher.

QueryRelationList.summary: Queries the members of a management account.

QueryResellerAvailableQuota.summary: Queries the remaining quota that can be used in the current account to make payments for other accounts.

QueryResourcePackageInstances.title: QueryResourcePackageInstances
QueryResourcePackageInstances.summary: Queries the instances of a resource plan. You can query the resource plans that are valid.

QuerySavingsPlansDeductLog.title: QuerySavingsPlansDeductLog
QuerySavingsPlansDeductLog.summary: Queries the deduction details of savings plans.

QuerySavingsPlansInstance.title: QuerySavingsPlansInstance
QuerySavingsPlansInstance.summary: Queries the information about the savings plans of the current user.

QuerySettleBill.summary: Queries the bills in a billing cycle. You can call this operation to query a bill that contains more than 50,000 entries in an account that is created on the Alibaba Cloud China site.

QuerySkuPriceList.title: QuerySkuPriceList
QuerySkuPriceList.summary: Queries the stock keeping units (SKUs) of a service. In most cases, a service has one or more SKUs. A service may even have tens of thousands of SKUs. You can call this operation to query the SKUs of a specific service and the prices of the SKUs. You can configure request parameters to query the specified SKUs based on the configurations of the SKUs.

QueryUserOmsData.title: QueryUserOmsData
QueryUserOmsData.summary: Queries the usage data of an Alibaba Cloud service.

RefundInstance.title: RefundInstance
RefundInstance.summary: Unsubscribes from an instance that is no longer needed.

ReleaseInstance.title: ReleaseInstance
ReleaseInstance.summary: Releases instances by Virtual Network Operators (VNOs).

RelieveAccountRelation.summary: Terminates a financial relationship between the management account and a member.

RenewInstance.summary: Renews a specified instance. You cannot call this operation to renew Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances, ApsaraDB RDS instances, or ApsaraDB for Redis instances. To renew these types of instances, call the dedicated operation of the corresponding service.

SetAllExpirationDay.title: SetAllExpirationDay
SetAllExpirationDay.summary: Sets an expiration date for all Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances.

SetResellerUserQuota.title: Modify the quota ledger and consumption ledger.
SetResellerUserQuota.summary: Modify the quota ledger and consumption ledger.

SubscribeBillToOSS.title: SubscribeBillToOSS
SubscribeBillToOSS.summary: Subscribes to the bills that are stored in Object Storage Service (OSS) buckets.

UnsubscribeBillToOSS.summary: Unsubscribes from the bills that are stored in Object Storage Service (OSS) buckets.
